name: C&T 21 Piece Titanium Twist Drill Bit Set, Cobalt Drill Bit Sets,Titanium Twist Jobber Drill Bit Set for Cutting Hard Metals, Such as Stainless Steel, Aluminum Alloy and Titanium Alloy
short_description: 【Function】Our drill bit sets are compatible with most drills , providing a perfect match. They are versatile and ideal for cutting hard metals，such as stainless steel, aluminum alloy and titanium alloy.

【Material】Our titanium twist Jobber drill bit sets are made of high-quality stainless steel , ensuring strength and durability for daily and long-term use. They are corrosion-resistant and easy to maintain and keep tidy. Titanium coating can extend the life by 5 times.
【118°Split-Point Design】The 118-degree double back angle and twist design of the HSS drill bits increase the cutting speed, and is easy to automatically centering to prevent movement.

【Quick Replacement, Safe Installation】The titanium nitride coated drill bit sets are neatly packaged in a sturdy storage box, providing convenient organization at home or on the go. The clear lid of the storage box allows for easy identification and quick access to the drill bit sets.

name: 30 PCS Titanium Impact Drill Bit Set, Hex Shank Drill Bit Set for Wood, Steel, Metal, and Plastic with Quick Change Design, HSS Titanium Twist Drill Bit with Storage Case, 5/64" to 1/2"
short_description: HSS Titanium Coating: Classic HSS construction with premium quality titanium coating, increasing wear resistance and durability. Hex shank drill bits increase cutting speed with self-centering and prevent walking, clearing chips and particles faster.

Quick Change: 1/4 inch hex shank fits into all power tools more easily and securely, especially for locking into quick change chuck, eliminating the frustration of the shank spinning in the chuck. Ideal for DIY, home use.

135°Split Point: 135° split point geometry ensures an accurate start and reduces walking on the working surface. Double U shape flutes design clear chips effectively, decreasing friction and heat for a faster, cooler drilling process.
Our Service: Our Each bit has an assigned hole in a drill bit holder with size indexing for easy storage, and size satisfy all your need. If you have any problem, please contact us.

name: 3Pcs Titanium Step Drill Bit Set, High Speed Steel Titanium Coated Drill Bits, 1/8" - 3/4" Total 28 Sizes for Plastic, Wood, Sheet Metal, Aluminum Hole Drilling
short_description: 1/4" Hex Shank: Quick change 1/4" (6.35mm) hex shank, which can be easily fit into power driver, drill and press drill.
Material: The step drill bits are made of high quality high speed steel which with titanium coating, durable, anti-corrosion, sharp enough to drill through wood, plastic, sheet metal.
Two-Flute Design: Two-flute design makes it easier for cutting, provides smoother, accurate, faster cutting, it's really good tools for us.
After-sale Service: If our cone drill bits don't meet your expectations, just feel free to let we know and we will provide you with free replacement service.

name: DEWALT Drill Bit Set, Titanium Impact Ready, Ideal for Metal, Wood, and Plastic, 12 Piece (DD5152)
short_description: Helps deliver no-walk start and speed with patented pilot point
Optimum durability with tapered core
Quick chip extraction through optimized flute geometry
Long life enabled by Titanium Nitride Coating
product_description: With its unique Pilot Point Tip, the DEWALT IMPACT READY Titanium Coated Drill Bits deliver speed and clear holes with minimal burr. The feature tip helps reduce bit walking and titanium coating delivers long life. The optimized flute helps delivers better control of the bit and patented web taper helps increase bit strength. Ideal for metal, wood, and plastic.

name: 13 Pcs Titanium Coated Twist Hex Shank Drill Bit Set, 135 Degree Tip HSS Impact Drill Bit Set with Storage Case for Metal, Aluminum, Steel, Wood, Plastic, Quick Change Design 1/16" to 1/4"
short_description: HSS Titanium Coating: GMTOOLS hex shank drill bits with titanium coated high speed steel, increasing wear resistance and durability. The cutting edge is hardened and honed for sharpness, suited for wood, aluminum alloy, stainless steel, plastic, etc.

Flutes Form and 135°Split Point: 135° Split Point makes drilling easy with less pressure and prevents drill bits from walking. Double U shape flutes clear chips effectively, decreasing friction and heat for a faster, cooler drilling process.

Quick Change: 1/4" hex shank compatible with power screwdrivers, impact drivers, and other tools that accept 1/4" hex shanks, eliminates the frustration of shank spinning in chuck, easily locking into a chuck without slipping and falling off.

Size: 13 different sizes including 1/16", 5/64", 3/32'', 7/64", 1/8", 9/64", 5/32", 11/64", 3/16", 13/64'', 7/32", 15/64" and 1/4", Each bit has an assigned hole in a drill bit holder with size indexing for easy storage and quick organization.
Quality Commitment: If for any reason you are not satisfied with your purchase, please contact us. We provide 30-day money back. 100% Satisfaction Guarantee for risk-free shopping!

product_description: Titanium Nitride Coating resists heat and friction, extending the cutting edge life up to 6 times that of other high-speed step drill bits. name: Luckyway 9/32" M35 Cobalt Drill Bits Titanium Aluminum Nitride Coated (TiAlN) with Bullet Point Tip Perfect for Steel, Hard Metal, Cast Iron 5-Piece
short_description: What You Get - Include 5PCS 9/32" Cobalt Drill Bits, packed in a plastic box for easy storage

Unmatched Precision with Bullet Point Tip - The Luckyway M35 Cobalt Drill Bits feature a specifically crafted bullet point tip that minimizes wandering, ensuring precise and accurate drilling in various materials.

Superior Durability with Titanium Aluminum Nitride Coating - Each cobalt drill bit is coated with titanium aluminum nitride (TiAlN), which enhances surface hardness to 89HRC, providing outstanding heat resistance and prolonged sharpness for efficient drilling.

Heavy-Duty M35 Cobalt Construction - Engineered from high-speed M35 cobalt steel, these drill bits are designed to excel in demanding heavy-duty scenarios, offering superior strength and durability for drilling through tough metals and hard materials.

Versatile Applications for Metalworking - Our cobalt drill bits are perfect for a wide range of applications, including drilling into hard metals, stainless steel, cast iron, and titanium alloy, making them essential tools for repair, construction, and woodworking projects.

Complete Set for Your Toolbox - The Luckyway M35 Cobalt Drill Bit set includes 5 pieces, ensuring you have the right size available for any job. Experience fast and easy penetration through hard metals with this must-have drill bit collection.

name: Milwaukee 48-89-4680 18-Piece Shockwave Impact Duty Thunderbolt Titanium Drill Bit Set w/Anti-Walking 135 Degree Angled Tip and Storage Case
short_description: SHOCKWAVE GEOMETRY: These bits are rated to stand up to high torque applications from heavy duty drill / drivers
CHIP CLEARING: A parabolic flute form helps clear chips and debris away from the bit, decreasing friction and heat for a faster, cooler drilling process
TITANIUM COATING reduces heat buildup, making this safer to use with minimal warping while working on multiple applications in rapid succession

STORAGE: These bits come with an included, robustly designed, plastic storage case. This has a slide lock system and individually molded compartments for each bit, so you can bring them in transit or keep them in your tool kit without worrying about them retaining damage
product_description: If you want to bore clean holes on a construction or general contracting job, then you need Milwaukee’s titanium bits. This kit, the 48-89-4680, is a collection of several standard-sized bits of some of the most premium quality on the market. Everything about these bits, from the extended hex shank, to the 135 no-walk tips, is crafted for the professional tradesman to get the job done with speed and precision. The shafts are designed with a particular helix geometry that allows the bits to clear chips and debris away from them while boring through wood. This, coupled with the titanium coating on every bit in this kit, cuts down on friction and heat, speeding up the hole boring process while minimizing damage sustained by your bits. You’re not limited to working with only wood. These bits are also capable of drilling through PVC and some metals. Keep these bits with you in their sturdy carrying case, and you’ll be Milwaukee ready for whatever job may come your way.

name: 276pc Titanium Twist Drill Bit Set with S2 Bits 135° Tip High Speed Steel, Size from 1/16" up to 1/2", Ideal in Wood Cast Iron Aluminum Alloy Plastic Fiberglass, Clear Lid Case
short_description: Process Treatment: Titanium coated surface prevent rusting, which increase the hardness of the drill bit and reduces heat buildup, make the twist drill bit more wear-resisting for longer life

Twist Design & Performance: The 135° fast cutting point is automatically centered and penetrates quickly with less pressure, prevent walking, clear chips and particles faster; Produced by precision fully ground which ensures chips move smoothly
Premium Material: Drill bits made from high speed steel for strength and durability; Screwdriver Bits are made of S2 steel material for ultimate durability

Scope of Application: Ideal for DIY projects and household maintenance and repair; All-purpose for use on Wood/Cast Iron/Aluminum Alloy/Plastic/Fiberglass drilling as well as multiple driving and fastening
Visible Organization and Storage: Clear lid of 256 Piece Titanium Twist Drill Bit Set allows you to see drills at glance easily

name: DEWALT Titanium Nitride Coated Drill Bit Set, Pilot Point, 21-Piece (DW1361)
short_description: Titanium Nitride Coating Pilot Point for Longer Life
Starts on contact for cleaner holes
No spin shanks
Tapered web provides greater durability to reduce breaking
Includes sizes from 1/16-inch to 1/2-inch in a plastic tough case
product_description: Featuring heavy-duty titanium nitride coating PILOT POINTs that start on contact and helps to prevent walking, the DEWALT includes commonly used bits for a range of metal and wood-drilling applications. No-spin shanks helps to prevent bits from slipping, and a tapered web delivers helps to increased durability to helps to reduce breakage. A durable carrying case keeps bits organized and ready to go.
